content.question: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A and B. Briefly analyze how the subject of the etching reflects artistic trends in sixteenth-century Europe. Based on the painting and your knowledge of European history, briefly analyze TWO features of European leisure activities in the period from the mid-fifteenth to the mid-seventeenth century.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A and B. Briefly analyze how the subject of the etching reflects artistic trends in sixteenth-century Europe. Based on the painting and your knowledge of European history, briefly analyze TWO features of European leisure activities in the period from the mid-fifteenth to the mid-seventeenth century.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
